reviews.review: Berry sad ending that leaves room for a sequel
all time masterpiece. By far the best movie Marvel ever released. And I love the unpredictable ending of the movie. Hope to see all of the dead Avengers in Avengers 4!
"Infinity War" brings the many faces of its multiple franchises together for their most ambitious film yet, and the results are pretty amazing.
So so soooo good I watched it 6 times and Iâ€™m still not tired of it. Incredible.
I watched it twice, it was so good

I really loved this movie sm but there were a lot of dumb decisions. This movie made everyone upset.SPOLIERS: Idk how the Russo brothers are gonna bring the people who died in iw but if the people who turned into dust or "died" don't come back I will be very upset.

Wheaton understands the avengers movies better then the russos. He understands giving the fans scenes and shots and set pieces they have always wanted to see on screen. He also understands how to write and show these characters with established personalities interact. Those are the 2 main things this avengers is missing. Also im not a big fan of the guardians so that part i didn't care about much. Also it is part one of a 2 part story so there is a chance they stick the landing in Pt 2 and everything falls into place which would bring this movie up a notch. Thanos is a great character and is super well done. The fight scene on titan with thanos is the best action of this movie but the final epic battle does not live up to any other of the marvel movies.
it was really good lot of good fighting scenes good graphics good details kept me in my seat vary thrilling but the end was vary dull the ending could have been better

Best out of all the marvel films by far!! I've already watched it 7 times and pre ordered it on sky to keep! Incredible film and very dissapointed that it got less than (at the very least) 90% from your so called professional reviewers!!
i mean: it's the best mcu film so far
